In difetto, l’ospite dovrà versare un importo pari a tre mesi di mancato preavviso;

• Monthly fees payments are made in advance, to be settled by the 5th day of each month,
exclusively via credit/debit card or bank transfer to
“Conservatorio SS. Concezione” at the following bank:
Banca Intesa Sanpaolo
IBAN: IT 58 I 03069 09606 1000 00150902
BIC: BCITITMM
Reason for payment: Surname Name and fee for the month of…/heating/deposit/other…
• If the room is occupied after the 1st day of the month, the fee is calculated by the day in thirtieths;
• If the room is vacated after the 15th day of the month, the fee is due for the entire month;
• In case of early cancellation before the agreed period, a 3-month notice is required.
If the notice is not given, the guest must pay an amount equal to three months' rent as a penalty;
• As a guarantee for any damage (repairs or replacements) due to improper use of the room,
each guest agrees to pay at the beginning of their stay a non-interest-bearing deposit, that is equivalent to one month's rent.
